title: Venezuelans vote in election that could oust an autocrat
content: Opposition candidate Edmundo González, a stand-in for banned leader Maria Corina Machado, leads President Nicolás Maduro by double digits, polls show.
summary: Opposition candidate Edmundo González, a stand-in for banned leader Maria Corina Machado, leads President Nicolás Maduro by double digits, polls show.

title: Israel strikes deep in Lebanon after rocket attack, stoking fear of wider war
content: Israel had promised revenge for a rocket strike from Lebanon that killed 12 in the Golan Heights town of Majdal Shams. Hezbollah denied responsibility.
summary: Israel had promised revenge for a rocket strike from Lebanon that killed 12 in the Golan Heights town of Majdal Shams. Hezbollah denied responsibility.

title: Trump vs. Biden on immigration: 12 charts comparing U.S. border security
content: Here are 12 charts showing the state of the United States immigration system and the southern border under Biden vs. Trump.
summary: Here are 12 charts showing the state of the United States immigration system and the southern border under Biden vs. Trump.

title: How India’s warm embrace of Kamala Harris grew chilly
content: India was excited about Kamala Harris in 2020. Four years later, the reaction to her presidential bid is more complicated.
summary: India was excited about Kamala Harris in 2020. Four years later, the reaction to her presidential bid is more complicated.

title: F-16 fighter jets arrive in Ukraine but may not tip advantage against Russia
content: Ukrainian and Western officials now caution that the aircraft once championed by Kyiv as a game changer are unlikely to make an immediate impact on the battlefield.
summary: Ukrainian and Western officials now caution that the aircraft once championed by Kyiv as a game changer are unlikely to make an immediate impact on the battlefield.

title: Canada owes First Nations for treaty breaches, top court rules
content: The negotiated settlement is expected to be sizable after Canada’s top court ruled that the government “made a mockery” of the 1850 Robinson Treaties.
summary: The negotiated settlement is expected to be sizable after Canada’s top court ruled that the government “made a mockery” of the 1850 Robinson Treaties.

title: Attacks in Gaza and Golan Heights kill more than 40, many of them children
content: An Israeli strike in Gaza killed at least 30 people. In the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights, a rocket attack the military blamed on Hezbollah left 11 people dead.
summary: An Israeli strike in Gaza killed at least 30 people. In the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights, a rocket attack the military blamed on Hezbollah left 11 people dead.

title: After ‘big show’ in U.S., Netanyahu returns to turmoil at home
content: The prime minster’s inner circle was largely satisfied with the trip — but it might not solve Netanyahu’s cratering popularity among the Israeli electorate.
summary: The prime minster’s inner circle was largely satisfied with the trip — but it might not solve Netanyahu’s cratering popularity among the Israeli electorate.

title: How many athletes are in the Paris Olympics, and other key numbers
content: The Paris Olympic Games will see about 11,040 athletes take part in 32 sports including athletics, basketball and rowing. Here are the numbers you need to know.
summary: The Paris Olympic Games will see about 11,040 athletes take part in 32 sports including athletics, basketball and rowing. Here are the numbers you need to know.

title: In Miami, Venezuelan diaspora anxiously watches a vote it can’t participate in
content: Many Venezuelans in the United States would like to cast ballots against Nicolás Maduro. But the vast majority won’t be able to vote in what could be a consequential election.
summary: Many Venezuelans in the United States would like to cast ballots against Nicolás Maduro. But the vast majority won’t be able to vote in what could be a consequential election.

title: Netanyahu’s U.S. visit revealed ‘no workable plan’ for peace, critics say
content: A “day after” plan in Gaza is a critical component of President Biden’s vision for peace. Lawmakers say that, for all the effort, it remains a pipe dream.
summary: A “day after” plan in Gaza is a critical component of President Biden’s vision for peace. Lawmakers say that, for all the effort, it remains a pipe dream.

title: U.S., Japan to unveil first steps towards enhanced military alliance
content: Biden administration looks to strengthen deterrence against China with a new joint operational command in Japan.
summary: Biden administration looks to strengthen deterrence against China with a new joint operational command in Japan.

title: If Maduro loses, will he cede power? Venezuela’s election, explained.
content: The opposition is hoping for a victory so overwhelming that the authoritarian socialist will be compelled to negotiate a transition.
summary: The opposition is hoping for a victory so overwhelming that the authoritarian socialist will be compelled to negotiate a transition.

title: Russia, adapting tactics, advances in Donetsk and takes more Ukrainian land
content: The new offensive focus comes as Ukraine faces depleted forces, sweltering heat and turmoil in a potentially consequential U.S. election.
summary: The new offensive focus comes as Ukraine faces depleted forces, sweltering heat and turmoil in a potentially consequential U.S. election.

title: The Paris Olympics, in comics
